attributes.action: cut the price of petrol and diesel to at least 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the price of petrol and diesel is absolutely shocking!! 0.95p a litre...that is a joke to be honest. CUT THE PRICE OF FUEL NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
